title: Handle a Blocked Crossing
description: A train has stopped and is blocking a public road crossing for an extended period. The dispatcher must resolve the situation.

tasks.description: Receive a report (from the public or the train crew) that a crossing is blocked.
tasks.expected_outcome: The dispatcher is aware of the blocked crossing.

tasks.description: Contact the train crew to determine the reason for the stop (e.g., mechanical issue, waiting for another train).
tasks.expected_outcome: The dispatcher understands why the train is stopped.

tasks.description: If possible, instruct the crew to 'cut' the train (separate the cars) to unblock the crossing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The crew is instructed to clear the road.

tasks.description: Log the blocked crossing event, as many jurisdictions have regulations about how long a crossing can be blocked.
tasks.expected_outcome: The event is logged for compliance reporting.
